movies.title: Jhamkudi
movies.description: Raniwada, a village in Gujarat, is cursed by an evil witch named JHAMKUDI during Navratri celebrations. Real estate agent Bablo and royal family heir Kumud return to face the witch's wrath and save Raniwada.

movies.title: Raado
movies.description: Powerful people with strong political influence, leaders of the crowd, and determined law enforcement collide with one another and the universe implodes.

movies.title: Vash
movies.description: Atharva, a family man, takes his family for a vacation and unfortunately gets trapped in black magic by a stranger named Pratap.

movies.title: Chaal Jeevi Laiye
movies.description: In his quest to become successful, Aditya Parikh puts life on the back burner, including his Father Bipin Chandra Parikh. Infuriated and heartbroken, the father persuades his monotonous son to take an unplanned journey of a lifetime for a much needed appreciation that life deserves. Their trip to bliss soon turns into a nightmare when they meet a backpacker named Ketki Mehta. An enigma in her own way, she takes the father-son duo on a voyage that turns out to be more than they bargained for.

movies.title: Udan Chhoo
movies.description: Thanks to our orthodox thinking society, at any given time, at any given neighborhood, some love-struck rebellious couple is eloping from their families. Such stories have become a staple diet for newspaper, news channels. It's usually not a shocker. But what if I tell you that this is a story about a very unique elopement that will shock you to the core? Middle-aged lovers, who are about to be "in-laws", elope from their children's wedding. In short, "Vehvai-Vehvan Bhagi Gya Chhe!!".

movies.title: 3 Ekka
movies.description: Set in the backdrop of Janmashtmi Festival, the story is narrated by Lord Krishna himself. Three friends stuck in financial crises, come up with an idiotic plan to transform a simple middle-class house into a secret gambling den. A mystical divine intervention keeps hinting to not go down this disastrous path. The clock is ticking; the target is to generate a substantial amount of money in one day of gambling. The rib-tickling tension keeps rising as a series of mishaps inside and outside the gambling den keeps piling up. By the end, all of their money and all of their relationships are at stake. Will they win or lose?

movies.title: Hu Ane Tu
movies.description: The story revolves around Umesh, who rekindles his romance with his long-lost college crush Ketaki, a divorcee. Meanwhile, Umesh’s son Tejas meets the girl of his dreams: Reva. As the father and son prepare for a double wedding, they encounter numerous challenges. What ensues is roller-coaster ride entailing misunderstandings, twists, and trials as they navigate the crossroads of tradition and modernity.

movies.title: Chhello Divas
movies.description: The movie revolves around the lives of eight friends and their journey of growing up while they face the highs and lows of their relationships, love and romance, the end of their college days and the beginning of a new life.

movies.title: Lakiro
movies.description: Richa and Hrishi fall in love and get married. Like most working couples, their careers slowly started to create a divide between them. Things turn so ugly that they eventually decide to file for divorce. Do they get back together?

movies.title: Passport
movies.description: Anna, an American student, comes to Ahmedabad to explore Amdavadi culture. She loses her purse carrying all essentials including her passport. Kabir, her college friend, helps her in getting it back. Will they get the passport back, or will Anna have to leave India immediately? A flight full of entertainment when a maverick don and a mysterious thief join the band.

movies.title: Nadi Dosh
movies.description: New generation love birds, Riddhi and Kevin, shrewdly tackle the issue of 'Naadi Dosh', an old and dogmatic faith.

movies.title: Aum Mangalam Singlem
movies.description: Childhood friends and sweethearts are ready to get married. But they also want to experience being single before taking the plunge.

movies.title: Shubh Yatra
movies.description: A young man, on the advice of an agent, lies that he is married, to go to the USA. But his visa application is rejected and now, he has to follow-up with a string of lies to hide one lie.

movies.title: Fakt Mahilao Maate
movies.description: Chintan Parikh, a 28-year-old middle-class man constantly surrounded by and troubled by the women in his life. On one fateful trip to Ambaji Temple he prays and asks for a power that could help him understand women and his wish is granted. Watch the drama unfold after he starts hearing voices.

movies.title: Vickida No Varghodo
movies.description: A man's ex-girlfriends unexpectedly show up to his wedding, forcing him to confront his past and make a difficult decision about his future. A heartwarming and funny film about love, loss, and finding your way in life.

movies.title: Karsandas Pay and Use
movies.description: Two brothers, Sundar and Tilok, run a pay-per-use restroom when Tilok meets Jaya.

movies.title: Hellaro
movies.description: A group of suppressed women from a village in Gujarat find someone in the desert and their lives are changed forever.

movies.title: Golkeri
movies.description: Sahil and Harshita, overnight end their perfect relationship of two years. But, as much as they want to move on and move away from each other, they are stuck in awkward situations put up by their parents who make persistent attempts to bring them back together. Will their parents’ concern cross the line and turn into interference? Or will they triumph in explaining the children that a relationship is just like ‘Golkeri’ – A sweet-sour traditional Gujarati pickle. The taste only gets better with time.

movies.title: Saheb 2019
movies.description: The protagonist takes up a fight for his fellow students which brings him in direct conflict with the management. As his agitation becomes stronger, he is threatened for his life by the Chief Minister, in return, he challenges to dethrone him from power in 30 days. The story takes many twists and turns and keeps the audience guessing all the time.

movies.title: Gujjubhai the Great (2015)
movies.description: Superhit comedy film about how father, with the help of his employee, prevents daughter from marrying wrong person.

movies.title: GujjuBhai: Most Wanted 2018
movies.description: Gujjubhai and his son Khagesh try a shortcut to earn money which gets them into trouble with terrorists and cops.

movies.title: Love Ni Bhavai
movies.description: A popular radio personality with an aversion to love meets two men with differing views on romance. RJ Antara is an FM radio disc jockey in Ahmedabad. She is against love and relationships initially and tells her boss K, Krishna, that she would never fall in love. She wins an award for the youngest RJ achiever when she meets Aaditya, a rich businessman. Aaditya had earlier been stuck in heavy traffic and observed Antara helping in clearing the traffic. Gradually, they became best friends and Aditya genuinely wanted to see her happy. Their friendship was rumored in a news magazine as a love story. Antara gets a call from Swati, who asked her what to answer as her boyfriend Sagar, who was going to propose to her on Valentine's Day. Antara asked Swati to listen to her heart and break up with Sagar if she is not happy and doesn't see any future with him. Convinced, Swati rejected Sagar's proposal and breaks up with him. Sagar learns that the breakup was because of Antara's advice and he decides to take revenge on her. Sagar, and his photographer friend, hope to publish a picture of Antara and Sagar together to ruin Antara's reputation. The two of them blackmail Antara's producer and learn that she is taking a trip to Diu, India. Sagar joins her on the bus, befriends her but falls in love with her as he starts spending time with her on the trip. Sagar then asks his friend to avoid posting the photos until he tells him to do so. Antara also falls for Sagar. Sagar invites Antara to a birthday party at his home, where she goes to Sagar's room and finds the pictures of her trip with Sagar on his laptop and realizes that he was using her for some motive. She becomes angry, thinking that Sagar was just using her to become famous. When she leaves, Sagar tries to stop her and reveals that his anger is from his rejection by Swati. Antara tells Sagar not to talk with her henceforth. Aaditya, learning about Sagar and Antara's Diu trip, calls Sagar to his office to warn him to stay away from Antara. Aaditya proposes marriage to Antara but she doesn't immediately respond. Sagar calls her on her radio line to say that, without her, his life has become monotonous and he misses her. Antara ignores Sagar's calls and messages and agrees to marry Aditya. Sagar learns of this and goes to Antara's office, but her boss Krishna tells Sagar to stay away from Antara and avoid hurting her more. Because Antara refuses to respond to Sagar's calls and messages, he sends her a letter asking whom she remembers the most when she gets up in the morning, when drinking coffee and when listening to songs online. Sagar's friend tells him that his boss is planning to post all the trip pictures in the newspaper on her wedding day to defame Antara. This makes Sagar tense, but he somehow manages to delete all the pictures from the boss' laptop with the help of his friend and snatches the pen-drive with the backup, and throws it into the lake. Aaditya happens to read Sagar's letter at Antara's home and realizes that she is not happy with the marriage proposal. Despite his questions, Antara chooses to stay quiet and wants to marry Aaditya. During the marriage ceremony, Aaditya meets Antara and asks her to say the truth about whom she really thinks of in her mind. When she cannot answer, he tells her that his aim was to see her happy, whether with him or with anyone else. They leave the wedding ceremony and return to her radio station where she asks the city to help find Sagar. Antara gets help from a tea vendor where Sagar is sitting. Antara arrives and proposes to Sagar, saying that she wants to forget her earlier anger and wants to start a new relationship with him, which Sagar happily accepts. Then, Sagar thanks Aaditya for such a huge sacrifice of his life.

movies.title: Thai Jashe
movies.description: Thai Jashe! is an urban Gujarati film about the struggles of a middle class man to achieve his goals in the metrocity Ahmedabad. The film stars Manoj Joshi, Malhar Thakar and Monal Gajjar.

movies.title: Lagan Special
movies.description: Lagan Special is a story of a couple (Shekhar and Suman) who are supposed to get married tomorrow morning and tonight is the sangeet sandhya. It's an arranged marriage where Shekhar seems to be over excited about the marriage but moments before sangeet sandhya function suman finds that shekhar doesn't love her and so she is heartbroken and decides to call off the wedding. How the family gets involved in the quarrel between bride and groom and how shekhar tries to convince her that he is genuinely in love with her and tries to convince her for the marriage makes for the later part of the story.
